channel.title: Weather Underground on Nishadh KA
channel.description: Recent content in Weather Underground on Nishadh KA

item.title: Script for json to csv for weather underground API fetching historical data
item.description: based on this https://github.com/PythonJournos/LearningPython/blob/master/tutorials/convert_json_to_csv.py a sample script import urllib2 import json import csv outfile_path='history.csv' writer = csv.writer(open(outfile_path, 'w')) headers = ['date'] writer.writerow(headers) req = urllib2.Request("http://api.wunderground.com/api/YOUR_KEY/history_20131001/q/India/Coimbatore.json") opener = urllib2.build_opener() f = opener.open(req) data = json.load(f) for history in data['history']['observations']: row = [] row.append(str(history['date']['pretty'])) row.append(str(history['tempm'])) writer.writerow(row) Now the URL has to be iterated to give a range of historical data required, and most important the date range has to set.
